community maps make it the best game

This game is just a staple in pc gaming. If you play FPS games and have never played this, then chances are you're absolute doggy cheeks. This is the game that will pump your tiny baby, puppy nuts, filled with Dwayne Johnson Testosterone. Hell, maybe after 20 hours on this game you'll finally sprout your first chest hair. 
     CSGO is a platform that transcends gaming as a right of passage for the youngest of children or G-Fueled cracked COD chad. The memories I have with this game are cherished and are some of the most fun times I've ever had gaming. 3/5

Hay muchos listos que juegan con ventajas que no comparten con los otros jugadores con mas reflejos que ellos. Muy dificil quedar el primero. Y te dicen que no sabes jugar. Son ruínes y cobardes que no debería jugar con los valientes y con más coraje que ellos.
Juego totalmente competitivo y para gente que le guste los juegos de shooter

Игра интересная, нужно думать тактики игры и прочее. Минусы 
1 Читеры (их тут овер много даже более чем)
2 64 тикрейт (бываете плохо регает пули и влияет на раскид гранат)
3 И есть пару неприятных багов.
Вообщем игра хорошая, но плохой анти чит (ну как... Его можно сказать и нету!)
fun game to play with friends

This is one of the most toxic games of all time that is very hard to play well unless you no-life the game. Cheaters are rampant and there is nothing you can really do to counter them other than wait through a full game against them or take the ban for leaving the game early. On top of all of that trying to control recoil is nothing like any game I've ever played before. Jumping and shooting? hope you like outlining your enemy with bullets. Slightly walking? outlining the enemy. Spraying fully or semi auto? hope you like missing. Also on top of all of that you cross hair means nothing unless you are crouching, not moving, and slowly tap firing with your gun because this game has the most extreme weapon bloom ever. The only true way to have fun is to goof around or sweat to victory.

overall id give this game a 9/10
игра не супер секс но если на голову пакет надеть то трахать можно
